Section heading here This documentation is obviously not complete yet. I'm writing this just as a placeholder until I really document this package, later. Here's how to write math: x=\frac{-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}}{2a}.
Example new paragraph.
Jupyter-Viz is how you reference package names and is how you reference functions.
